Attributes.description: Electricity and magnetism, electrical circuits, induction, electromagnetic waves, Maxwell's equations and applications.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of PHYS 106, PHYS 107 or (b) a score of 85% or higher in one of PHYS 101, PHYS 117, PHYS 131.
Attributes.coreq: Co-reqs: One of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121.
